Description: You just don't see many apartments in Columbia with the kind of space or scenery as Autumn Crest Apartments. Autumn Crest Apartments offers one, two, and three-bedroom apartments on a wooded hillside, looking out over Lake Kittamaqundi towards downtown Columbia. With views that give you peaceful moments and roomy interiors that add a little zip to daily life. Generous dimensions mean lots of space for you and all your things such as party sized living rooms, separate dining areas, fully equipped kitchens you can move around in, many with unique architectural openings, big bedrooms with plenty of closet space, and some with walk-in closets. There's also a balcony or patio, washer/dryer, designer carpeting and flooring, and linen and coat closets. Features to make your life easy, comfortable, and fun. The location has everything going for it. You're right across Route 29 from the movies, restaurants, and shops at Town Center and Columbia Mall. You can walk there, or to Oakland Mills Village Center. You can get to I-95 in minutes, for an easy drive into Baltimore or Washington. You're surrounded by things to do. Swimming, tennis, ice skating at Oakland Mills Community Center, jogging and bike trails, concerts at Merriweather Post Pavilion, the library, dinner theater, clubs, classes, even work, if you have to. It all amounts to what could be the best apartment value in Columbia. Shop around, then come see us. We have every reason to believe you'll fall for Autumn Crest Apartments.

Description: Columbia Choice in Columbia, Maryland has newly renovated, spacious one, two and three bedroom apartments; featuring outstanding upgrades such as stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, cherry cabinetry, and hardwood flooring. Columbia Choice is conveniently located between Washington, D.C. and Baltimore with easy access to I-95, Route 29, Route 32 and public transportation. You're close to the great dining, shopping and entertainment attractions of Columbia Town Centre. Our resident golfing enthusiasts love being a short distance from a world-class golf course, too. Living at Columbia Choice, you'll spend less time in your car and lots more leisure time enjoying your new home and popular on-site amenities like our Wi-Fi Internet Cafe and business center, two playgrounds, and BBQ/picnic areas. Visit our award-winning suburban community soon. Before you know it, you'll be home!

Description: Bell Columbia offers luxury apartment homes, surrounded by some of the most desirable residential neighborhoods in Columbia, Maryland. One of the most successful planned communities in the country, Columbia is a magnet in the Baltimore- Washington corridor, attracting families in search of good schools and businesses. Named #1 on Money Magazine's Best Places to Live in 2016, Columbia ranks in the top 5% of the 823 places on the list for job growth and economic opportunity, and the schools are some of the best in the country. Bell Columbia is located three miles west of Columbia Town Center, anchored by Nordstrom, eleven miles from Fort Meade, twenty miles from Baltimore, and thirty miles from both Annapolis and Washington, DC. Residents choose Bell Columbia because of the upgraded apartment finishes, community amenities, and location seven miles west of I-95. All of our homes have been newly enhanced and include energy efficient appliance package, custom 42 cabinets, track lighting in the kitchen, breakfast bar, brick entry, great storage space, built in microwave, and private patio or balcony and covered parking is available. Our residents will enjoy a Resident Lounge with a complimentary Wi-Fi, Outdoor Pool with Sundeck and Wi-Fi, Wellness Center with Cardio and Free Weight Equipment, Outdoor Exercise and Nature Trail and much more! We are also located in the prestigious Howard County School District. Bell Columbia is professionally managed by Bell Partners, Inc. and we offer excellent resident service features such as online rent payment,online service request submission, our Good Neighbor Pledge , flexible lease terms, and nationwide transfer program. Call, Visit, or Apply Online Today!

Description: Ideally situated in Columbia, MD, The Greens at Columbia has one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent. Enjoy a full kitchen, washer and dryer, ceramic-tile bath, and a private entrance. Select apartments have a renovated interior, frost-free refrigerator with icemaker, brushed silver appliances, separate dining room, fireplace, loft, skylight, and high ceilings. You'll also enjoy a pool with deck, picnic area, and car care area. Plus, you'll be living in Columbia, MD, ranked eighth among MONEY Magazine's 2012 Best Places to Live in America! * The Greens at Columbia is in the Baltimore/Washington DC corridor, near I-70, I-95, I-695, U.S. Route 27, and Route 175. We're on a bus route to the Park and Ride. Robinson Nature Center, Hawthorne Park, Food Lion of Columbia, Wegmans, and Howard County Public Schools are minutes from your door, too! Off-street parking is provided; carports are available. Military clause honored; housing choice vouchers welcome. Cats and dogs are allowed.

Description: Tamar Meadow offers remarkable amenities and stylish apartments in Columbia, MD. Enjoy spacious floor plans complete with large closets, central air conditioning, private balconies or patios, and thoughtful finishes. Select apartment homes have been given an extensive makeover and include beautiful honey oak cabinetry, updated appliances, and washers and dryers. Relax by our resort-style swimming pool and take advantage of our 24-hour fitness center, car care center, and resident clubhouse. In addition to convenient amenities, Tamar Meadow is located less than three minutes from I-95 and 10 minutes from I-295. Our ideal location provides close proximity to Howard County Schools, Columbia Mall, as well as convenient access to Baltimore Harbor, Washington DC, and the best of Maryland. Visit us today and take a personalized tour of our Columbia apartment community from our friendly and helpful staff. Experience premier resident services and better apartment living at Tamar Meadow.

Description: Now leasing brand new apartments! Located adjacent to Lake Kittamaqundi in Downtown Columbia, Lakehouse offers convenient living near a multitude of desirable amenities, restaurants and shopping destinations. With The Mall in Columbia within walking distance, residents have access to over 25 restaurants, 50 retail stores, and one of Maryland's top concert venues- Merriweather Post Pavilion. Located just off of Columbia Pike, Lakehouse offers all of the conveniences of living in the city with a small town feel. With brand new luxurious amenities, beautiful views of downtown Columbia, and access to the lake right outside your door, you'll have the best of both worlds at Lakehouse.

One Time Fees:
* Admin Fee: $350
* Application Fee: $50
Pet Policy:
Dogs and Cats Allowed:
The following breed restriction list include dogs that are known to be aggressive toward strangers and/or children, or to be destructive in indoor environments. Pets that contain a mix of any of the breeds listed are not permitted: American Bulldog, American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Chow-Chow, Rottweiler, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.

Description: Apartments in Columbia have never been more appealing. At Clary's Crossing, you'll find the lifestyle you've been looking for. Come home to a 1, 2, or 3-bedroom Columbia apartment with exceptional styling including 9' ceilings. Then, enjoy some of the best amenities in Howard County including hiking and jogging trails for those wanting outdoor activities and a sparkling pool perfect for those seeking some relaxation. At Clary's Crossing, you'll live in a wonderful neighborhood just moments from the area's medical hub and close to shopping and dining at such locations as The Mall in Columbia and Wilde Lake Village Green Shopping Center. The apartments for rent near DC at Clary's Crossing make finding what you need easier than ever. With its great shopping, dining and entertainment venues such as the Merriweather Post Pavilion, Columbia is a one-of-a-kind place to live. Make the most of it at Clary's Crossing. Please call for an appointment today.

Description: Escape to a vacation at home with Beech's Farm. Your new home is nestled in a serene garden style setting with lush landscape and convenience. At Beech's Farm you will enjoy residing in one of the most sought out apartment home communities within the Village of Kings Contrivance. We offer several large 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans with private balconies, large closets as well as 3 bedroom townhomes to complete your overall living experience. Our community is in walking distance to the Village of Kings Contrivance where Harris Teeters is open 24/7 and other favorite local eateries and banks are footsteps away. Whether you choose to relax at home or enjoy taking a stroll at the nearby jogging trails and parks, we are certain that Beech's Farm will be the place you can enjoy calling Home!

Dogs Allowed:
Acceptable animals include domestic cats, fish (maximum tank size: 50 gallons), birds and dogs. Dogs that are purebreds or mixes of the following breeds are prohibited: Akita, Alaskan Malamute, Chow-Chow, Doberman, German Shepherd, Great Dane, Pit Bull (American Staffordshire Terrier, American Pit Bull Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier), Rottweiler, Saint Bernard, Shar Pei, and Siberian Husky. All other animals are prohibited. NO ANIMAL IS AUTHORIZED WITHOUT MANAGEMENT’S PRIOR WRITTEN PERMISSION AND THE EXECUTION OF AN ANIMAL ADDENDUM. Limit of two pets per home and weight limit cannot exceed 120 lbs. combined. 
* $250 Deposit

* 2 Pet Limit

Complete apartment renovations are underway for your convenience, including complete kitchen and Bathroom renovations, including brand new appliances, ceramic tile floors, and full size washer and dryer in most apartments. In the heart of Columbia, Maryland and only minutes to the area's superb shopping, dining, recreation, schools and entertainment, urban-chic meets village-charm at The Verona at Oakland Mills apartment rental community.

Description: Columbia Landing is situated on gently rolling slopes with abundant trees, natural landscaping, hiking trails, lakes and playgrounds. We are close to everything, world class shopping, premiere entertainment, unlimited employment opportunities, excellent schools, diverse restaurant choices and magnificent parks and green spaces – all in your back yard! Our newly renovated apartments feature HUGH floor plans, and easy access to outdoor living. Each apartment features an entry foyer, ample storage, and a balcony or terrace. Residents have easy access to all major highways and public transportation is just steps from your door. A very close commute to NSA, Fort Meade, John Hopkins and MedStar Heath. We offer discounts to Military and Government Employees.

Description: LUXURY PENTHOUSE level! ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED! You do not pay any utilities. NO PARKING FEES. Available October 1. Upscale Downtown. Vintage high rise LUXURY LIVING condo. Brand new cherry wood flooring! High end carpet in upper hall and bedrooms. Downtown upscale living. Walking distance to Columbia Mall, grocery, restaurants, Starbucks across street. Tennis, Indoor and outdoor pools, bike trials, athletic center within 5-10 minute walking. Secured building with two elevator and lots of FREE parking. Fantastic views from bedrooms and private terrace, balcony, Solarium with outdoor private terrace. Walk-in master closet. Full length Mirrors in Master bedroom. Completely remodeled baths. Marble floors in baths and halls. Marble Master sink, Granite sink in 1/2 bath. Designer light fixtures. Expansive terrace for living room and upper level bedrooms. Ceiling fan. Lots of sunshine. Quiet. Laundry room on the floor. Entry Lobby area, intercom, storage. Gas cooking.

Description:
Townhouse in Columbia for Rent - Available November 1st, 2017.
Brick front townhouse backs to woods
Very convenient location for commuting- Easy access to Rt 32, Rt 95, Rt 29, & Broken Land Parkway
In Kings Contrivance Community- close to Harris Teeter shopping center.
3 large bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms plus a half bath on main level.
2 master bedrooms are upstairs, each with their own full bathroom attached. Great setup for roommates.
3rd bedroom is in the basement (walkout basement). There is a full bathroom in the basement as well. Basement has a utility/laundry room.
Main level has living room, kitchen with attached dining area, and a half bathroom.
Nice big deck off of living room.
House is non-smoking. 
Rent is $2050. 1st month's rent and security deposit due at lease signing.
Location is Stonebrook Ln. off of Guilford Rd.
Email with any questions - thanks!

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
The home: Newly remodeled, verrry cozy 3BR end-unit townhome with lots of character! Newly refinished reclaimed solid hardwood floors, wood burning brick fireplace, new carpet upstairs, a balcony, in-unit washer and dryer, lots of storage space and lots of lighting !
The Community: 2016s Money Magazine named Columbia the best small city to live in! Consistently named as one of the top cities to live in, Columbia is packed with trees, trails, rivers and lakes spanning several miles. Just steps from your front door, is the quiet and scenic Lake Elkhorn Trail! Following this trail (steps from the front door) in just a miles run or a quiet walk you will reach the scenic Lake Elkhorn Park shown in the photos below. Directly across the street, you have the East Columbia Public Library that has ample amount of well-lit study spaces, vast catalog of books and many more resources. Currently only partially opened, the library will reopen bigger and better this December with the finalization of its remodeling. There is a local Farmer's Market every Thursday in the parking lot of the library across the street! Giant Supermarket is also walking distance or 2-3 min driving. Columbia Mall, Whole Foods and the famous Merriweather Post Pavilion Amphitheater are less than 2mi away, situated near Lake Kittamaqundi. Lots of music, food, and shopping right by the water! Snowden Shopping Center less than 3 min drive. 20 min away from DC and Baltimore, both, off of RT29 and RT95.
Dasher Brown Community Center is a quarter of a mile away, where there is a fitness center, pool, and many more community resources!

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed

Description: Love the outdoors but want to be close to shopping and great restaurants? You've found it! Lovely brick 3 BDR, 1.5 BTH townhouse for rent in the Long Reach Village in Columbia, overlooking wooded running trail and stream, backing to open space and playground. Laminate flooring throughout 1st and 2nd floor, new windows, new HVAC system, ceramic tile, SS appliances. Great deck for outdoor living! Basement half finished for extra living space. Tennis courts, basketball court, and Locust Park Pool located in the community. Minutes away from I-95 and I-29, a commuter's dream. A must see!

One Time Fees:

* Application Fee: $25
Pet Policy:
Dogs and Cats Allowed:
We are a pet friendly community with a pet deposit of $300 for one pet and $450 for 2 pets. The pet rent is $40 per pet. Please call for more information and breed restrictions. 
* 80 lb Weight Limit
* 2 Pet Limit
Services: * Pet Care

Description: Poplar Glen Apartment Homes is conveniently located in the heart of Columbia, just minutes from shopping and dining and the Mall of Columbia. We offer spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes, with upgraded cabinetry and appliances, walk-in closets and fireplaces in select floor plans. Our community offers an array of amenities that include a brand-new clubhouse, state-of-the-art fitness center, business lounge and grilling area.

Description: Welcome to The Evergreens at Columbia Town Center Apartments - A Maryland Retirement Community For Leasing Info Call or Text: (410) 807- 3585 We offer one or two bedrooms, sunrooms, family room, balconies, terraces, or dens. All fully-loaded with top-of-the-line features and amenities, and all taken care of by our on-site staff. Plus, Evergreens is located in the heart of Columbia, MD's exciting Town Center. You can walk to the Mall in Columbia or enjoy a movie at the AMC theater. Take a class at Howard Community College. Catch up on your reading at the Howard County Library. Enjoy dining, golf courses, live entertainment, performances at the Rouse Theatre, festivals, and more. Now is the time to relax and enjoy yourself. An apartment community for active adults aged 55+ who are ready for a carefree lifestyle. Our Maryland retirement community features beautiful and spacious apartment homes designed for your needs - For more information on our 55+ apartment community, please

Description: Beautiful maintained 3 Bedroom 1.5 bath single family at the end of the street.Hardwood floors throughout with lower level tile rec room. A wrap around deck allows you to enjoy a wooded lot that backs up to untouched Blandair Park. Lead free certificate.

Description:
(410) 440-8284 - Updated 2 Bedroom Condo in Columbia - Shadow Oaks - Updated 2 Bedroom Condo located in a controlled access building with intercom. The Shadow Oaks community is conveniently located off Rt 175 with a nearby shopping center and the Columbia Ice Rink. Freshly painted with new carpet, the spacious living room/dining room combo leads to and updated kitchen with new cabinets and granite countertops. Access the enclosed sun room from the living room or kitchen! Multiple walk-in closet, as well as dual powder rooms in the master and hall with adjoining shared shower.
Call Eric at Bay Management Group for details or to schedule an appointment 410.440.8284 or email ebrecka@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this home or get more information on our website www.baymgmtgroup.com
(RLNE3601830) Other Amenities - Other- updated kitchen, walk-in closet, fresh paint, new carpet, controlled access building, intercom, sunroom.

Description:
(240) 778-3264 - Beautifully Updated 4BR/3.5BA in Columbia, MD! - Located in the Columbia area of Howard County and very convenient to I95, Rt. 32, and BWI. This beautiful 3 bedroom and 3 1/2 bath single family home offers many amenities. The first floor has gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout, a spacious living room, separate dining room and updated ½ bath with new fixtures. The first floor also features a spacious eat in kitchen with granite countertops, updated appliances, separate pantry and plenty of cabinet storage space. The 2nd floor has an updated hall bath and 3 massive bedrooms including a spacious master bedroom with walk in closets and full master bath with tiled tub enclosure and his/hers vanity. There is a spacious basement with lots of space for entertaining, including a working wet bar, separate bedroom and fully updated bath. Exterior features include a beautifully landscaped fenced in back yard, deck/screened-in sunroom and a 1 car garage!
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional deposit.
Contact David at (970) 331-4037 for details or to schedule an appointment or email djannati@baymgmtgroup.com.
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3537887) Other Amenities - Other- hardwood floors, fully equipped kitchen, pantry, granite countertops, eat-in kitchen, updated bathroom, walk in closet, basement clubroom, wet bar, sunroom, Garage, Yard. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(970) 331-4037 - Newly Updated 2BR/1.5BA TH in Columbia, MD - The first floor has a spacious living room/dining room combo with beautiful working pellet stove to help with those winter utility bills as well as an updated ½ bath with new tiled flooring and a laundry area with new stackable washer/dryer included! First floor features a spacious, fully renovated kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage space, laminate hardwood flooring, custom tiled backsplash and all appliances including dishwasher. The second floor has 2 spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space and a full bath. The house has central air, new light fixtures/ceiling fans throughout, and a spacious fenced in patio with well maintained garden beds for entertaining! The house is conveniently located to walking trails, Rt. 29, Rt. 100, Rt. 32, I70, I95, Columbia Mall, Howard County schools, hospitals and many great shops/restaurants!
Contact David at (970) 331-4037 for details or to schedule an appointment or email djannati@baymgmtgroup.com

Description:
(970) 331-4037 - Beautiful Updated 4BR/3.5BA SFH in Columbia, MD - Beautiful Updated 4 Bedroom 3 Full and 1/2 Bathroom Single Family Home in Columbia, MD. Features rich hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room, separate dining room, ½ bath, separate room with built in shelving that would make a great office or play room, laundry/”mud room” with washer/dryer included, and a “great room” with wood fireplace. Updated eat in kitchen features granite countertops including breakfast bar and all stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and gas stove. Second floor has a full hall bath with tiled floors and custom tiled shower enclosure as well as 3 spacious bedrooms including a master bedroom with impressive master bath with marble tiled floors, jetted soaker tub, separate tiled walk in shower and marble top vanity. Third floor is another master suite with a full master bath with custom tiled walk in shower. Fully finished basement clubroom with 2 separate unfinished storage area. Spacious deck, patio and backyard with pond for entertaining. Tenants have access to get membership for “Columbia Association” pools and gyms!
Dogs considered on a case by case basis with an additional pet deposit. Sorry, no cats.
Contact David at (970) 331-4037 for details or to schedule an appointment or email djannati@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/

The master bedroom features a capacious walk in closet, and an intimate fireplace for relaxing evenings with close friends and family. Email or call now to schedule a viewing!!

Description:
Charming Upgraded 3 Bedroom, 1.5 bath Duplex located in Columbia, MD. End unit. Just upgraded ! Features new kitchen countertops,carpet and tile. Enclosed patio. Conveniently located in the heart of desirable Columbia, walking distance from libraries, pools, the Mall in Columbia, Merriweather Post Pavilion, Blandair Park, and the best school system in Maryland!
Utilities: Tenant pays electric, gas and water 
Call or e-mail today to schedule a showing! 
(410) 927-5005 
leasing@realpropertymetro.com 
**No Pets** **No Smoking** 
Application Requirements: 
- Everyone 18 and older MUST apply 
- Under 600 credit score will be denied 
- Under 650 may require up to 2 months deposit 
- Must gross at least 3x your amount of rent 
- Must have good rental history 
**security deposit, first month's rent and a signed lease due within 48 hours of approval, unless otherwise agreed upon** 
INFORMATION IS DEEMED RELIABLE, BUT IS NOT GUARANTEED, 
AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.
This property allows self guided viewing without an appointment. Contact for details.

Services: * Laundry Facilities

Description: **650+ Credit Score Required** Beautiful townhome located conveniently in Columbia, MD that's close to shopping, running trails, and transportation (I-95, Rt. 100 and Rt. 29). The property features wood floors throughout, galley styled kitchen and all appliances (Washer and Dryer, Dishwasher, Microwave, Range and New Refrigerator). With a powder room on the main floor and a finished basement with ample storage space, this home is sure to keep you comfortable. There is a small fenced yard in the back for your entertaining needs and 1 reserved parking space in the front with ample guest parking through-out. Schedule a visit TODAY! Absolutely NO SMOKING allowed. NO PETS.

Description:
187 units built in 1995. These spacious, beautiful garden apartment homes offer you superb design choices and spectacular amenities. From the luxury of a laundry room with a full-size washer and dryer right in your apartment, to the cost-efficiency of gas heat and cooking, you'll be thrilled with the Orchard Crossing lifestyle.
And you barely have to set foot out the door to enjoy the convenience of this Columbia location. We are an easy walk to the movies, day care, shopping, fast food and restaurants, banking, the hair salon and more! In addition, Orchard Crossing is ideally located for an easy commute to Baltimore, Washington, or Columbia, with close proximity to Routes 29, 95, 108, and 100, and Howard County Park-and-Ride lots.
This is Orchard Crossing. This is a great place to live. 24 hour on call emergency maintenance
Laundry room with full size washer & dryer in each apartment
Individually controlled gas heat and electric air conditioning
Oversized hot water heater
Wall-to-wall carpeting
Mini-blinds at all windows
Wired for Highspeed Cable & Internet
Walk-in closets
Kitchen Pantry
Linen Closets
Dishwasher & disposal
Frost-free refrigerator
Gas range & range hood
Smoke detectors and sprinkler system for your comfort & convenience
Separate storage area in each building

Description:
Maximum income for 2 people must not exceed $36,000 combined. Nestled in the village of Long Reach, Stoney Run is a well-kept secret. With easy access to Route-29, 100, and I-95, this vibrant community is an impressive introduction to the recreation, comfort, and convenience that characterize Columbia, MD. Stoney Run is minutes from shopping, restaurants, and entertainment and is zoned for great Howard County schools. The affordable, two and three bedroom townhomes feature private patios, decks, and verandas. Each has a washer and dryer, central air, gas stove, large closets and backyard space. Income requirements apply, call for details.
Office located at 3120 Burgess Mill Way, Ellicott City, MD 21043
